name: RageBall
description: A modern take on a classic game. RageBall is a 2d animation sports game, that pits player against player. With nine different playing fields for players to choose from, each playing field has new obstacles for players to overcome. The object is to deflect the balls back at your opponent, and to not allow the balls to get past you. If balls do get past you, your opponent gets a point. And if a ball gets past your opponent, you get a point. The first person to 10 wins the match. Can you overcome the Rage?
